title: "Week 11"
subtitle: "Large Language Models"

Large Language Models (LLM), such as GPT or LLaMA, are systems capable of processing and generating human-like text based on the input they receive. These models have been developed using vast amounts of textual data and are used in a wide range of applications, including natural language understanding, text generation, and answering questions.
